pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 6, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Société de transport de Montréal.

Societé de transport de Montréal
8845 Boul. St-Laurent
Hangar d’Youville
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later 9:15 a.m. for accreditation
  • Photo opportunity only


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Societé de transport de Montréal
8845 Boul. St-Laurent
Hangar d’Youville
Montréal, Quebec


Trois-Rivières, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with a family in Trois-Rivières and will hold a media availability.

Private Residence
2140, rue Pierrette
Trois-Rivières, Quebec

Note for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
